trans-unit.source: Associates activities together in a correlation by representing a particular shared <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey" /> or transient context in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Associa as atividades em uma correlação representando uma <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey" /> compartilhada específica ou um contexto transitório no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Windows Workflow Foundation (WF) provides four types of correlation: [Content Based](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [Request-Reply](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [Durable Duplex](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), and [Context Exchange](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md).
trans-unit.target: Windows Workflow Foundation (WF) fornece quatro tipos de correlação: [com base em conteúdo](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [solicitação-resposta](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [Duplex durável](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), e [intercâmbio de contexto ](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about correlation, see [Correlation Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), the specific correlation types mentioned previously, and the correlation samples located in the [Services [WF Samples]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) node of the WF samples.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a correlação, consulte [visão geral de correlação](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), os tipos de correlação específica mencionado anteriormente, e os exemplos de correlação localizados no [serviços [WF exemplos] ](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) nó dos exemplos de WF.

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução usa a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> para correlação se ele estiver presente, caso contrário, o **CorrelatesWith** propriedade da atividade de mensagens será usada.

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: Se ambos estiverem ausentes, o identificador de ambiente fornecido pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> ou o serviço de fluxo de trabalho é usado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> on a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply> atividade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> with the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Registra o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> no tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> with the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Cancela o registro do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> no tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho.
